appDesc.message: QWANT is a search engine that shows you the web in a different way. No tracking, No filter bubble, No cookies.

notification_shorten_msg.message: The shortened URL has been copied to your clipboard!

opt_showlast.message: Save the last research made with the extension

opt_explaination1.message: With the Qwant extension, enjoy the best of the web in one glance!

opt_explaination2.message: Sorted by categories (Web, News and Media), Qwant results will enrich your browser with new suggestions.

opt_explaination3.message: For more information on installing and uninstalling the extension, please read the following.

opt_install2.message:
Installing the extension is a breeze.
Go on the Chrome Web Store and click on the « Free » button.

You must be logged in to your Google account in order to install the extension.

opt_use2.message: You will find the extension on the right of your browser search bar, close to the menu button.

opt_use3.message: To search on Qwant from the search bar, hit 'Q' followed by your research.

opt_uninstall2.message: Here are the steps to uninstall the Qwant extension from your browser:

opt_uninstall3.message: On your browser, click on the menu button

opt_uninstall4.message: In the dropdown menu, select 'Tools' and then 'Extensions'

opt_uninstall5.message: Find the Qwant extension and click on the 'Remove from Chrome' icon

opt_thanks.message: Thank you for choosing the Qwant extension for Google Chrome!
